languages.english-overview:
Scripty2 is a powerful, flexible JavaScript framework to help you write your own delicious visual effects & user interfaces.
Scripty2 is licensed under the MIT License.
languages.english-features:
Scripty2 extends the Prototype Javascript Framework by adding visual effects, user interface controls, and utilities :
Compact
Modular
Object-Oriented JavaScript framework
Cross-browser code
Coherent API
Browser Compatibility
scripty2 is divided into three parts, core, fx, and ui, and supports IE6+, Safari 3+, Firefox 3+, Chrome, Opera 10 and most WebKit-based browsers.
